hip.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: one of the two parts on each side of your body between the top of your leg and your waist
hip.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: She stood there with her hands on her hips glaring at him.
The old lady had fallen and broken her hip.
hip.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: the red fruit of some kinds of roses
hip.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: doing things or done according to the latest fashion
hip.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: McMillan’s novel gets my vote for hippest book of the year.
hip.translation[3].definitions[0].defini: the abbreviation of Home Information Pack
hip.translation[4].definitions[0].defini: home income plan; an arrangement that allows you to have an income from the EQUITY in your home (=the part of your home’s value that would belong to you if the house was sold)
hip.translation[4].definitions[0].exampl: The alternative to the mortgage-based Hip is a plan where you sell, rather than mortgage, part or all of your house.
